title: Cam Newton, GMs, NBA, and where Colin was right and wrong
itunes:title: Cam Newton, GMs, NBA, and where Colin was right and wrong
description:
Colin discusses why Cam Newton is no longer as good as most people think, why it is important for GMs to learn new technology, why playing the remainder of the NBA season in one place is a good idea, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Bob Costas, and Bucky Brooks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
